name: Shotgun Billie Alpha
description:
Shotgun Billie is a fast paced speed running game where you take control of a hybrid between a human and a shotgun and use it's unique habilities to travel at high speeds!

Go through the levels and hit all the targets, try your best to beat you highscores!

Heat up those legs and reach incredible speeds in this neon filled world!

Full release planned for late 2021.

All of the music in the game was made by Graphics Groove and can be found in the links section below.
